00004 /* Simple timer class by Roman Dementiev
00005  */
00006 
00007 #include "stxxl/bits/namespace.h"
00008 
00009 #include <time.h>
00010 
00011 #ifndef BOOST_MSVC
00012  #include <sys/time.h>
00013 #endif
00014 
00015 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_TIMESTAMP
00016  #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00017  #include <cmath>
00018 #endif
00019 
00020 
00021 __STXXL_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00022 
00023 class timer
00024 {
00025     bool running;
00026     double accumulated;
00027     double last_clock;
00028     inline double timestamp();
00029 public:
00030     inline timer();
00031     inline void start();
00032     inline void stop();
00033     inline void reset();
00034     inline double seconds();
00035     inline double mseconds();
00036     inline double useconds();
00037 };
00038 
00039 timer::timer() : running(false), accumulated(0.)
00040 { }
00041 
00042 double timer::timestamp()
00043 {
00044 #ifdef STXXL_BOOST_TIMESTAMP
00045     boost::posix_time::ptime MyTime = boost::posix_time::microsec_clock::local_time();
00046     boost::posix_time::time_duration Duration = MyTime.time_of_day();
00047     double sec = double (Duration.hours()) * 3600. +
00048                  double (Duration.minutes()) * 60. +
00049                  double (Duration.seconds()) +
00050                  double (Duration.fractional_seconds()) / (pow(10., Duration.num_fractional_digits()));
00051     return sec;
00052 #else
00053     struct timeval tp;
00054     gettimeofday(&tp, NULL);
00055     return double (tp.tv_sec) + tp.tv_usec / 1000000.;
00056 #endif
00057 }
00058 
00059 void timer::start()
00060 {
00061     running = true;
00062     last_clock = timestamp();
00063 }
00064 void timer::stop()
00065 {
00066     running = false;
00067     accumulated += timestamp() - last_clock;
00068 }
00069 void timer::reset()
00070 {
00071     accumulated = 0.;
00072     last_clock = timestamp();
00073 }
00074 
00075 double timer::mseconds()
00076 {
00077     if (running)
00078         return (accumulated + timestamp() - last_clock) * 1000.;
00079 
00080 
00081     return (accumulated * 1000.);
00082 }
00083 
00084 double timer::useconds()
00085 {
00086     if (running)
00087         return (accumulated + timestamp() - last_clock) * 1000000.;
00088 
00089 
00090     return (accumulated * 1000000.);
00091 }
00092 
00093 double timer::seconds()
00094 {
00095     if (running)
00096         return (accumulated + timestamp() - last_clock);
00097 
00098 
00099     return (accumulated);
00100 }
